remarks: A rational polynomial of degree less than an algebraic number cannot be zero at that number unless it is the zero polynomial.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Nov-2014.)
statement: dgraa0p $p |- ( ( A e. AA /\ P e. ( Poly ` QQ ) /\ ( deg ` P ) < ( degAA ` A ) ) -> ( ( P ` A ) = 0 <-> P = 0p ) ) $.
